description: Take a photo of the most iconic landmark in the town.
Find and capture a picture of a unique piece of street art.
Pose in front of a local business and snap a photo.
Locate a historical marker and document it in a picture.
Take a photo in a public garden or park.
Capture an image of a local bus, train, or any public transportation.
Find a poster or banner advertising a local community event and photograph it.
Snap a picture of a welcome sign or town name sign.
Capture a photo from the highest point in town or any scenic overlook.
Photograph any form of wildlife you come across in a park or natural area.
Hug a tree and capture the moment in a picture.
Snap a photo of the most vibrant flower you can find in a public space.
Locate and take a photo near a water feature like a fountain, pond, or river.
Capture the beauty of either the sunrise or sunset in your town.
Find an artistically designed bike rack and photograph it.
Pose with a local gardener or in front of a community garden.
Take a photo in front of the main administrative or academic building on campus.
Capture a moment at a popular student hangout spot, like a coffee shop or common area.
Pose with a book or capture the library's unique architecture in a photo.
Find and photograph a statue or monument that holds significance on campus.
Take a picture in the central quad or any green space on campus.
Capture a photo of any wildlife that can be found on the college campus.
Snap a picture in front of a sports facility or stadium on campus.
Find and photograph any student-created artwork or mural.
